posts.post_content:
Offered here is an exceptional example of a 1914 B18 blanket of Hall of Famer Rabbit Maranville. This is the much tougher brown infield variation. It has excellent clarity color and registration. The borders are in great shape with consistent brown edge on all 4 sides. Theis an exmt blanket of a tough variation Hall of fame player. Brown blankets have always been tough to find and aside from Cobb Maranville is the only HOF with a Brown Infield 
144.99 plus 5.99 shipping with tracking Net
